reusable.name: Log In To Banner
reusable.step: I am on "MD_COMMON_LINKS_BPPBANNERURL" URL
I click on the "Banner Application Navigator" link
I fill the "Banner Username" field with "MD_COMMON_CREDENTIALS_BPPBANNERUSER"
I fill the "Banner Password" field with "MD_COMMON_CREDENTIALS_BPPBANNERPASSWORD"
I click on the "Banner Login" button
I should see the "Banner User Menu Icon" element

reusable.name: Navigate To Form
reusable.step: I fill the "Banner Go To Form" field with "SAADCRV"
I press "MD_COMMON_KEYBOARD_ENTER" for "Banner Go To Form"

reusable.name: Register New Student Account
reusable.step: I am on "MD_COMMON_LINKS_BUILDEMPIREURL" URL
I click on the "Direct App Register Link on Login Page" button
I set "AutoFirstName[####]" text to the "First name" "Build Empire text field"
I set "AutoLastName[####]" text to the "Surname" "Build Empire text field"
I set "EmailAuto[#####]/@/harakirimail.com" text to the "Email" "Build Empire text field"
I remember "0913<KW_AUTO_RANDOMNUMBER|#######>" text as "EC_PHONENUMBER" variable
I set "EC_PHONENUMBER" text to the "Telephone number" "Build Empire text field"
I remember "A@polloGlobal2018" text as "EC_PASSWORD" variable
I set "EC_PASSWORD" text to the "Password" "Build Empire text field"
I click on the "Direct App I Am Happy To Receive Information" button
I click on the "Direct App Register" button
I wait for "2" seconds
I should see the "Direct App My Applications Left Menu Link" button

reusable.name: Log In to Hub as Student
reusable.step: I am on "MD_COMMON_LINKS_BUILDEMPIREURL" URL
I set "EC_EMAIL_AUTO" text to the "Email" "Build Empire text field"
I set "EC_PASSWORD" text to the "Password" "Build Empire text field"
I click on the "Direct App Login Button" button
I should see the "Direct App My Applications Left Menu Link" element

reusable.name: Log In to Hub as Admin
reusable.step: I am on "MD_COMMON_LINKS_BUILDEMPIREADMINURL" URL
I fill the "Direct App Admin Email" field with "MD_COMMON_CREDENTIALS_BUILDEMPIRENEILADMINUSER"
I fill the "Direct App Admin Password" field with "MD_COMMON_CREDENTIALS_BUILDEMPIRENEILADMINPASSWORD"
I click on the "Direct App Login Button" button
I should see the "Direct App Admin Apps Top Link" element

reusable.name: Create Scholarships Application
reusable.step: I click on the "Direct App My Applications Left Menu Link" button
I click on the "Direct App What Are You Applying For Dropdown" element
I click on the "BPP University Scholarships" "Build Empire application type"
I click on the "Diret App Scholarship Dropdown" element
I click on the "Career Guarantee Scholarship" "Build Empire application type"
I click on the "Direct App Programme Dropdown" element
I click on the "Legal Practice Course (LPC)" "Build Empire application type"
I click on the "Direct App Create Application" button

reusable.name: Submit Application Hub
reusable.step: I click on the "Direct App Submit Application" button
I click on the "Direct App Confirm Application Radiobutton" button
I click on the "Direct App Submit Application on Confirmation Page" button
I validate text "CONTAINS=100" to be displayed for "Direct App Application Progress Percentage" element

reusable.name: Log Out from Hub Student
reusable.step: I click on the "Direct App User Icon Menu" button
I click on the "Direct App Logout" link
I wait for "1" seconds

reusable.name: Log Out from Hub Admin
reusable.step: I click on the "Direct App User Icon Menu Admin" button
I click on the "Direct App Admin Logout" link

reusable.name: Create Academic Appeals Application
reusable.step: I click on the "Direct App My Applications Left Menu Link" button
I click on the "Direct App What Are You Applying For Dropdown" element
I click on the "BPP University Academic Appeals" "Build Empire application type"
I click on the "Direct App Create Application" button

reusable.name: Accept Academic Appeals As Admin
reusable.step: I click on the "Direct App Admin Apps Top Link" button
I click on the "Direct App Admin Direct Apps List Option" element
I click on the "Academic Appeals" "Build Empire admin applications tab"
I fill the "Direct App Admin Filter By User" field with "EC_EMAIL_AUTO"
I press "MD_COMMON_KEYBOARD_ENTER" for "Direct App Admin Filter By User"
I click on the "Show" "button"
I click on the "Begin review" "Build Empire admin applications tab"
I click on the "Submit" "button"

reusable.name: Create Mitigating Circumstances Application
reusable.step: I click on the "Direct App My Applications Left Menu Link" button
I click on the "Direct App What Are You Applying For Dropdown" element
I click on the "BPP University Mitigating Circumstances" "Build Empire application type"
I click on the "Direct App Create Application" button

reusable.name: Accept Mitigating Circumstances As Admin
reusable.step: I click on the "Direct App Admin Apps Top Link" button
I click on the "Direct App Admin Direct Apps List Option" element
I click on the "Mitigating Circumstances" "Build Empire admin applications tab"
I fill the "Direct App Admin Filter By User" field with "EC_EMAIL_AUTO"
I press "MD_COMMON_KEYBOARD_ENTER" for "Direct App Admin Filter By User"
I click on the "Show" "button"
I click on the "Begin review" "Build Empire admin applications tab"
I click on the "Submit" "button"
I validate text "CONTAINS=Accepted" to be displayed for "Direct App Admin Status Changed for Mitigating Circumstances" element

reusable.name: Reject Mitigating Circumstances As Admin
reusable.step: I click on the "Direct App Admin Apps Top Link" button
I click on the "Direct App Admin Direct Apps List Option" element
I click on the "Mitigating Circumstances" "Build Empire admin applications tab"
I select "Submitted" from "Direct App Admin Assesment Status" element
I fill the "Direct App Admin Filter By User" field with "EC_EMAIL_AUTO"
I press "MD_COMMON_KEYBOARD_ENTER" for "Direct App Admin Filter By User"
I click on the "Show" "button"
I click on the "Begin review" "Build Empire admin applications tab"
I select "Reject" from "Direct App Admin New Status Dropdown" element
I click on the "Submit" "button"
I validate text "CONTAINS=Rejected" to be displayed for "Direct App Admin Status Changed for Mitigating Circumstances" element

reusable.name: Student Validates Application Status Changed
reusable.step: I click on the "Direct App My Applications Left Menu Link" button
I validate text "CONTAINS=Your application was successful." to be displayed for "Direct App Validate As Student Application Accepted" element

reusable.name: Put in Review Mitigating Circumstances
reusable.step: I click on the "Direct App Admin Apps Top Link" button
I click on the "Direct App Admin Direct Apps List Option" element
I click on the "Mitigating Circumstances" "Build Empire admin applications tab"
I select "Rejected" from "Direct App Admin Assesment Status" element
I fill the "Direct App Admin Filter By User" field with "EC_EMAIL_AUTO"
I press "MD_COMMON_KEYBOARD_ENTER" for "Direct App Admin Filter By User"
I click on the "Show" "button"
I click on the "Begin review" "Build Empire admin applications tab"
I click on the "Submit" "button"
I validate text "CONTAINS=Full application in review" to be displayed for "Direct App Admin Status Changed for Mitigating Circumstances" element

reusable.name: Complete Mitigating Circumstances
reusable.step: I click on the "Direct App Start Application" button
I click on the "Eligibility criteria" "Build Empire application section"
I click on the "Direct App Final Award In Relation To Programme" button
I click on the "Direct App Ten Working Days To Submit Application Yes" button
I click on the "Direct App Next" button
I fill the "Diret App Phone Number" field with "EC_PHONENUMBER"
I click on the "Direct App Country Dropdown" button
I click on the "Direct App Country Dropdown UK Option" button
I set "Address 1" text to the "Address Line 1*" "Build Empire text field"
I set "Address 1" text to the "Address Line 2" "Build Empire text field"
I set "London" text to the "Town/City*" "Build Empire text field"
I fill the "Diret App Postal Code" field with "12345"
I remember "KW_AUTO_DOB|DD/MM/YYYY_21" text as "EC_DOB" variable
I fill the "Direct App DOB" field with "EC_DOB"
I press "MD_COMMON_KEYBOARD_ENTER" for "Direct App DOB"
I set "London" text to the "Town/City*" "Build Empire text field"
I click on the "Direct App Mark As Complete Checkbox" button
I click on the "Direct App Next" button
I set "12345" text to the "SRN" "Build Empire course details element"
I set "Auto Location" text to the "Location" "Build Empire course details element"
I set "Automation" text to the "Programme" "Build Empire course details element"
I set "Automation" text to the "Programme Leader" "Build Empire course details element"

I click on the "Direct App Course Details Mode Part One" element
I fill the "Direct App Course Details Start Date" field with "12/2020"
I press "MD_COMMON_KEYBOARD_ENTER" for "Direct App Course Details Start Date"
I click on the "Direct App Course Details School" element
I click on the "Direct App Course Details School Law" element
I click on the "Direct App Mark As Complete Checkbox" button
I click on the "Direct App Next" button
I click on the "Direct App Add Assesment" button
I fill the "Direct App Assesment Title" field with "AutoTitle"
I click on the "Direct App Assesment Type" button
I click on the "Direct App Assesment Exam Type Option" button
I click on the "Direct App Assesment Attempt Number" button
I click on the "Direct App Assesment Attempt Number Option Two" button
I click on the "Direct App Sit Assesment Yes" button
I fill the "Direct App Assesment Date" field with "12/12/2018"
I press "MD_COMMON_KEYBOARD_ENTER" for "Direct App Assesment Date"
I click on the "Direct App Mitigating Checkbox If Application Is Successful" button
I fill the "Direct App Assesment Examination Venue" field with "Venue"
I click on the "Direct App Did You Apply For Deferral" button
I click on the "Direct App Add Filled Assesment" button
I click on the "Direct App Mark As Complete Checkbox" button
I click on the "Direct App Next" button
I upload "directApp.pdf" file to "Direct App Upload File" element
I fill the "Direct App Uploaded File Description" field with "Test"
I fill the "Direct App Details Text Area Line Manager" field with "Automation Testing"
I click on the "Direct App Mark As Complete Checkbox" button
I click on the "Direct App Save And Return" button

I fill the "Direct App Admin Filter By User" field with "EC_EMAIL_AUTO"

I click on the "Show" "button"

reusable.name: Complete Bespoke Sctotland Application After Review

I click on the "Direct App Mark As Complete Checkbox" button
I click on the "Direct App Save Review And Back" button

reusable.name: Mitigating Circumstances Admin Status Change
reusable.step: I click on the "Direct App Admin Apps Top Link" button
I click on the "Direct App Admin Direct Apps List Option" element
I click on the "Mitigating Circumstances" "Build Empire admin applications tab"
I fill the "Direct App Admin Filter By User" field with "EC_EMAIL_AUTO"
I press "MD_COMMON_KEYBOARD_ENTER" for "Direct App Admin Filter By User"
I click on the "Show" "button"
I click on the "Begin review" "Build Empire admin applications tab"
I validate text "In review" to be displayed for "Direct App Admin Status Changed for Mitigating Circumstances" element
I select "Referral Panel" from "Direct App Admin New Status Dropdown" element
I fill the "Direct App Admin Reason" field with "Reason Referral Panel"
I click on the "Submit" "button"
I validate text "Referral panel" to be displayed for "Direct App Admin Status Changed for Mitigating Circumstances" element
I select "Referral ODP" from "Direct App Admin New Status Dropdown" element
I fill the "Direct App Admin Reason" field with "Reason Referral ODP"
I click on the "Submit" "button"
I validate text "Referral ODP" to be displayed for "Direct App Admin Status Changed for Mitigating Circumstances" element
I select "Part Accept" from "Direct App Admin New Status Dropdown" element
I fill the "Direct App Admin Reason" field with "Reason Part Accept"
I click on the "Submit" "button"
I validate text "Part accepted" to be displayed for "Direct App Admin Status Changed for Mitigating Circumstances" element
I fill the "Direct App Admin Reason" field with "Reason Full Application In Review Second"
I click on the "Submit" "button"
I validate text "Full application in review" to be displayed for "Direct App Admin Status Changed for Mitigating Circumstances" element
I select "Accept" from "Direct App Admin New Status Dropdown" element
I fill the "Direct App Admin Reason" field with "Reason Accept"
I click on the "Submit" "button"
I validate text "Accepted" to be displayed for "Direct App Admin Status Changed for Mitigating Circumstances" element
I fill the "Direct App Admin Reason" field with "Reason Full Application In Review Second"
I click on the "Submit" "button"
I validate text "Full application in review" to be displayed for "Direct App Admin Status Changed for Mitigating Circumstances" element
I select "Reject" from "Direct App Admin New Status Dropdown" element
I fill the "Direct App Admin Reason" field with "Reason Reject"
I click on the "Submit" "button"
I validate text "Rejected" to be displayed for "Direct App Admin Status Changed for Mitigating Circumstances" element

reusable.name: Mitigating Circumstances Admin Status Validation
reusable.step: I validate text "User start" to be displayed for "Direct App Admin Started Status Reason" element
